info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 12:41AM CST until March 07 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTY... At 1241 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corning, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Corning, Reyno, Pollard, McDougal, Success, Datto, Twin Oaks and Palatka. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for eastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
